title: Sus-sous at The Ballet
description: Join in the fun, as kids from a dance school go through the process of class and rehearsal to get ready for their show, The Sleeping Beauty ballet. More adventures happen when the dancers discover kittens at the school! Entertaining and educational — for all ages — this book also includes special above-the-ceiling™ research resources: glossary, bookmark links, online guide, and three info-packed appendices! Charming illustrations by professional dancer and teacher, Marsha Maurer. Get it on iBooks.
author: Collette Ritz
